casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

August 6, 2010

[Cite as 08/06/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-3621.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-0692. Toledo Pub. Schools Bd. of Edn. v. Lucas Cty. Bd. of Revision.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 2007-A-1077. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals. Upon consideration of the joint motion to remand,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted and this appeal is remanded to the Board of Tax Appeals.

It is further ordered that a mandate be sent to the Board of Tax Appeals by certifying a copy of this judgment entry and filing it with the Board of Tax Appeals.
